text:
In some modules (linked_image for example) the image comes with a `Size` dropdown (see attached screen) which correspond to the `size_type` attribute of images (<https://developers.HubSpot.com/beta-docs/reference/cms/fields/module-theme-fields#image|doc>). However, following this documentation, I can't find a way to declare an image field in a fields.json file with this option available (default allow to choose a default size_type but not to select in a dropdown when configuring the module in a page).
In the design manager, when creating an image field there is a dropdown `Available size options` which allow to display or hide the dropdown but I can't find the corresponding field attribute to put in fields.json
